thread.title: The Latest: Kardashians show support for Lamar Odom online
thread.title_full: The Latest: Kardashians show support for Lamar Odom online - KPTV - FOX 12

author: cbs8
title: The Latest: Kardashians show support for Lamar Odom online
text:
LAS VEGAS (AP) - The latest on the hospitalization of Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious Tuesday in a Nevada brothel (all times local):
11:45 a.m.
The Kardashians are showing their support for Lamar Odom on social media.
Kourtney Kardashian on Thursday tweeted a photo of the former NBA star and fellow reality TV personality with her son, Mason. She wrote: "Believing in the power of prayer for this beautiful soul."
Her younger sister Kylie Jenner shared an image of herself with Odom on Instagram. The caption read: "Let's dance again together soon. Prayers up for Lamar please."
Kris Jenner and Rob Kardashian also posted pictures and asked for prayers on the photo-sharing site.
Khloe Kardashian is with her estranged husband at a Las Vegas hospital, where he remains after being found unconscious Tuesday at a Crystal, Nevada, brothel. There's been no official word on Odom's condition, but the Rev. Jesse Jackson visited him Wednesday and said he's on life support.
Odom's grandmother Florence Odom and his father, Joe Odom, declined to discuss his condition Thursday.
___
10:30 a.m.
Khloe Kardashian and the owner of the Love Ranch are sparring over the media frenzy surrounding Lamar Odom, who is hospitalized after being found unconscious at the Nevada brothel.
Both sides say Kardashian's reps reached out to brothel owner Dennis Hof on Wednesday, asking him not to speak to the press.
Hof says he's troubled by the lack of communication from Kardashian. He says he angrily dismissed their request that she do interviews instead of him.
"I know what happened," Hof said. "I'm the one protecting my business and telling the truth about it."
Kardashian's rep says they politely asked Hoff to respect their privacy.
Odom remains hospitalized in Las Vegas after being found unconscious Tuesday at the Crystal, Nevada, brothel.
